content: It's kind of a threefold type of product portfolio today between what we define as kind of legacy deception, which is still very much needed in today's world, especially as we focus on preventing lateral movement that is not always machine-driven but more user-driven, but then on top of that, the ability to assess risk within Active Directory not just on a go-forward basis but also on a look-back basis, allow you to eliminate configuration mismatches or any type of vulnerabilities you already have preexisting in your environment.
